snippet: The chief financial officer of the M.I.T. Sloan Sports Analytics Conference, an annual event in Boston, marries one of its founders.
lead_paragraph: Corbin Marie Petro and Jessica Clare Gelman were married Thursday at the Blue Hills Reservation, a state park in Canton, Mass. Daryl Morey, a friend of the couple who was given permission by the Commonwealth of Massachusetts to perform the ceremony, officiated. Ms. Petro (left), 33, is the chief operating officer of the Massachusetts Department of Medicaid in Boston. She graduated from Yale and received an M.B.A. from the University of Pennsylvania.
